[Link Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=2930) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

Your focus recovers faster. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you [Refocused](/Actions.aspx?ID=71), you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

<title level="2">Link Focus leads to...</title>
